content: I'm trying to set up a new browser, and sometimes it takes multiple attempts to get the password right (because they're pretty long). When mistakes happen, the user is locked out for awhile. Can I temporarily disable this feature?
@Edmund Lian Are you hosted on zulipchat.com or hosting your own server?
@Edmund Lian In that case, you can change the limit defined in authenticate_by_username in RATE_LIMITING_RULES in zproject/computed_settings.py
